title: The Best of The Dan Patrick Show
itunes:title: The Best of The Dan Patrick Show
description:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, DP recaps The Open Championship. Could Cam Smith be headed to the LIV Tour? DP discusses Tom Brady's comments about raising kids in a wealthy household. And Bryan Cranston discusses his appearance at the Celebrity All Star game in LA.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
